alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 28 at 4:20PM CDT until May 28 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR BEAVER COUNTY... At 419 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Balko, or 9 miles southwest of Beaver, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Hail may accumulate on roadways causing hazardous travel. Locations impacted include... Beaver, Forgan, Knowles, Elmwood, Bryans Corner, Boyd, Mocane, Slapout, Floris and Balko. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
